document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">Field </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">Stubble </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">lying </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">sere </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">Beneath </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">second </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">sun </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">toils </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7c38ff">Brindled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">People </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">tost </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">triumphs </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">Bin </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">Accosted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#70b4ff">timid </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">Bird </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">Irresolute </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">Alms </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">often </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">seen </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">seldom </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff2878">felt </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">On </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">New </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">England </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">Farms </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: A field of stubble lying sere
